article_title: Hagan concedes to Tillis in N.C.
article_text: - Sen. Kay Hagan (D-N.C.) conceded to Republican Thom Tillis on Tuesday night, bringing an end to the most expensive race in U.S. history. Tillis and outside groups that supported him hammered Hagan over her support of the Affordable Care Act. ()

article_summary:
- Sen. Kay Hagan (D-N.C.) conceded to Republican Thom Tillis on Tuesday night, bringing an end to the most expensive race in U.S. history.
Tillis and outside groups that supported him hammered Hagan over her support of the Affordable Care Act.
